terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.content: By using our service, you agree to these terms and conditions...
terms.serviceContent: Our service allows users to generate personalized stories using artificial intelligence. Users can create unique stories and convert them to audio.
terms.obligationsContent: Users must provide accurate information and not use the service for illegal or inappropriate purposes. It is the user's responsibility to maintain account confidentiality.
terms.privacyContent: Our privacy policy describes how we collect and use user information. We respect your privacy and protect your personal data.
terms.cancellationContent: Users can cancel their subscription at any time by following the established procedures. No refunds will be issued for unused periods.
terms.liabilityContent: We are not responsible for misuse of the service or any resulting damage. The user is responsible for the content they generate.
terms.changesContent: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time, notifying users of significant changes.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.collectionContent: We collect personal information such as name, email, and payment data to provide and improve our services. This information is obtained directly from users during registration and platform usage.
privacy.usageContent: We use the collected information to personalize user experience, process payments, send relevant communications, and improve our services. We do not share personal data with third parties without explicit consent.
privacy.protectionContent: We implement advanced security measures to protect our users' personal information. We use encryption, firewalls, and security protocols to prevent unauthorized access.
privacy.cookiesContent: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance user experience, analyze site usage, and personalize content. Users can control cookie usage through their browser settings.
privacy.rightsContent: Users have the right to access, correct, and delete their personal data. They can also request data portability and object to processing under certain circumstances.
privacy.changesContent: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy. Significant changes will be notified to users via email or through a notice on the platform.
